activities: The data processed under the Safe Harbor Framework from the Domino’s Pizza master franchisee and sub-franchisee stores in the European Union will be store-level data (including customer data, sales information and store employee information) captured in Domino’s proprietary point-of-sale solution system, "Domino’s Pulse." This data will be made available to franchisees and imported into the Domino's Pulse system on Domino’s U.S.-based servers for warehousing and processing of reports and analytics for the benefit of the master franchisee and sub-franchisee stores in the European Union.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Master and sub-franchisee store-level customer data, sales information and store employee information
recoursemech: Domino’s Pizza will be using a private sector dispute resolution program.  Domino’s has contracted with TRUSTe for this purpose.
